summary.overallFindings: Bank of America Corporation demonstrates comprehensive and concrete responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with detailed public evidence for transparency, fairness, explainability, oversight, privacy, governance, and external commitments. The company provides robust documentation, policy frameworks, and external collaborations supporting its responsible AI initiatives. No significant gaps were identified, reflecting a mature and well-documented approach to responsible AI. Bank of America stands out as a leader in transparent and accountable AI deployment within the financial sector.
